snippet: President Obama says he wants married couples to pay higher taxes on income above $250,000. But his plan actually excludes most joint filers making less than $300,000 — and many who make more.
lead_paragraph: President Obama says he wants married couples to pay higher taxes on income above $250,000. But his plan actually excludes most joint filers making less than $300,000 — and many who make more.

headline.seo: No Tax Increase for Many ‘Wealthy’ Families
headline.main: No Tax Increase for Many ‘Wealthy’ Families
